content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® b165 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com encore worsted cuddle buddies blanket - crochet approx finished size 32 x 34 materials encore worsted 4 100g balls one in each of 4 colors with over 80 colors the possibilities are endless mark as a b c d shown in colors a = 1235 pecan pie heather b = 1232 light greenhouse c = 1317 vacation blues d = 1202 sand hook size j crochet hook gauge 3 double_crochet =1 panel #1 using color a chain 54 row 1 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook double_crochet in next 5 chs *chain 1 skip 1 chain double_crochet in next 7 chs repeat from * until 5 chain remain chain 1 skip 1 double_crochet in last 4 chain turn row 2 chain 3 counts as double_crochet here and throughout 3 double_crochet *chain 1 skip ch1-space double_crochet in next 7 sts repeat from * to end of row turn row 3 chain 3 double_crochet in next 6 double_crochet *chain 1 skip ch1-space double_crochet in next 7 sts repeat from * until 5 sts remain chain 1 skip ch1-space double_crochet in last 4 sts turn abbreviations chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch p l y m o u t h y a r n® b165 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com repeat row 2 and 3 until a total of 30 row have been worked switching to color b on the last stitch of the final row continue in color b until 30 row have been worked in color b fasten_off panel #2 make a second panel exactly the same using colors c and d assemble place the panels side by side placing the last section where you double_crochet in the last 4 chain toward the inside where they will be seamed using a whip stitch sew to create a flat center vertical seam weave in all ends ©2023 plymouth yarn company 060423jbt color suggestions in encore worsted to coordinate with the cuddle buddies unicorn - 793-29-146-1201 dog primary - 133-1382-1386-235 alt 459 dog pastel - 1201-597-470-1033 bear natural - 1232-1235-1202-154 bear baby - 1033-449-9801 alt 6007 heather -470 fox - 466 alt 6007 heather -1236 abbreviations chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch
